message: Let's start fair. I take most of the money, but I'll give you a little to start.
I'm willing to give you a decent share, but I think I deserve a bigger chunk since I'm the one making the offer
Okay, I see you want a bigger share, but I'm still willing to split the money.  This is my final offer.
I'm not going to give in to your lowball offer. I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better deal than that
I'm getting impatient. This is my final offer. If you reject it, we'll both get nothing.
I'm not going to give in to your ultimatum. I'm willing to take a risk and make a bold move. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
Fine, I'll accept your offer, but I think you're making a mistake. I'll still get a good amount, and you'll get nothing.
I'm not going to back down now. I'll take a chance and try to get a better deal. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
